H0.text: The Bull is the village pub in an everyday tale of country folk. In which village is The Bull. Littleton

H1.text: The Bull is the village pub in an everyday tale of country folk. In which village is The Bull. Nether Wallop

H2.text: The Bull is the village pub in an everyday tale of country folk. In which village is The Bull. Castle Combe

H3.text: The Bull is the village pub in an everyday tale of country folk. In which village is The Bull. Ambridge

A4.text: The Bull, the village's only pub, is perhaps the most recognisable structure in Ambridge along with St Stephen's Church.

A5.text: The Archers is set in the fictional village of Ambridge in the fictional county of Borsetshire.
